name: Preschool Program
description: Alta Plaza Preschool is open Monday through Friday from 7:30am to 5:30pm. We offer full-day (7:30am to 5:25pm) and half-day (7:30am to 12:20pm) options. Families can choose between five or four day schedules. We offer a three-day transitional schedule for incoming Year 1, Yellow Ducks for the first four months (September to December) of the school year. Five day attendance is required for Year 3, Blue Bird Pre-k students.

cost: This is a fee based service.
